settings.text: Our mission is to awaken women with safe and nourishing cosmetics that embody beauty wellness. We are committed to nurturing the natural beauty that is God-given to all women through mindful beauty tools, and cosmetics that are infused with clean, pure, and organic ingredients that prioritize your well-being.

We will bring awareness tothe toxic ingredients that are found in products from companies that don’t care about your health (many of these brands don’t believe ingredients matter or they prioritize profits over purity), while crafting skin and body care essentials that reflect the essence of what nature intended them to be—organic formulations that nourish and feed your skin while enhancing your natural beauty.

We believe in creating a beauty routine and choosing products with wellness at the heart, and holistic considerations in mind. In return, your health and skin can flourish. We will empower women to say “No” to ‘Big Beauty’, raise their expectations for what they accept within their cosmetic products, and encourage them to nurture their natural beauty holistically.
We are dedicated to creating skin and body care products that nourish your skin and allow your beauty to flourish.

Ourphilosophy is that natural beauty is God-given to all women and it can be cultivated and enhanced with healthy, skin-loving cosmetics untainted byunnecessary toxic ingredients as well as a healthy lifestyle.
